text: Map of the electoral wards of Hart from the 2014 election One third of Hart District Council in Hampshire, England is elected each year, followed by one year without election. Since the last boundary changes in 2014, 33 councillors have been elected from 11 wards. ==Political control== Since the first election to the council in 1973 political control of the council has been held by the following parties: {| border="1" cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 1em 1em 1em 0; background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 95%;" ! Party in control || Years |- ! style="background-color: | Independent || 1973 - 1979 |- ! style="background- color: #5B76FF" | Conservative || 1979 - 1983 |- ! style="background-color: #CCCCCC" | No overall control || 1983 - 2000 |- ! style="background-color: #5B76FF" | Conservative || 2000 - 2005 |- ! style="background-color: #CCCCCC" | No overall control || 2005 - 2010 |- ! style="background-color: #5B76FF" | Conservative || 2010 - 2012 |- ! style="background-color: #CCCCCC" | No overall control || 2012–present |} ==Council elections== *1973 Hartley Wintney District Council election *1976 Hart District Council election (New ward boundaries)legislation.gov.uk - The District of Hart (Electoral Arrangements) Order 1976. Retrieved on 19 November 2015. *1979 Hart District Council election *1980 Hart District Council election *1982 Hart District Council election *1983 Hart District Council election *1984 Hart District Council election *1986 Hart District Council election *1987 Hart District Council election *1988 Hart District Council election *1990 Hart District Council election (District boundary changes took place but the number of seats remained the same)legislation.gov.uk - The Hampshire (District Boundaries) Order 1990. Retrieved on 6 November 2015. *1991 Hart District Council election (District boundary changes took place but the number of seats remained the same)legislation.gov.uk - The Berkshire, Buckinghamshire, Hampshire, Oxfordshire and Surrey (County Boundaries) Order 1991. Retrieved on 5 November 2015. *1992 Hart District Council election (District boundary changes took place but the number of seats remained the same)legislation.gov.uk - The Hampshire and Surrey (County Boundaries) Order 1991. Retrieved on 5 November 2015. *1994 Hart District Council election *1995 Hart District Council election *1996 Hart District Council election *1998 Hart District Council election *1999 Hart District Council election *2000 Hart District Council election *2002 Hart District Council election (New ward boundaries)legislation.gov.uk - The District of Hart (Parishes and Electoral Changes) Order 2001. Retrieved on 4 October 2015. *2003 Hart District Council election *2004 Hart District Council election *2006 Hart District Council election *2007 Hart District Council election *2008 Hart District Council election *2010 Hart District Council election *2011 Hart District Council election *2012 Hart District Council election *2014 Hart District Council election (New ward boundaries)legislation.gov.uk - The Hart (Electoral Changes) Order 2012.
